Text: Credit Facility Press ReleaseFinal Draft Cc Attached for your review is the final draft of the press release on the credit facility Please provide comments by the end of day today We anticipate release on Friday before the market opens See attached file eott release credit increase vdoc Mary Ellen Coombe EOTT Energy Vice President HR and Administration PO Box Houston TX W Sam Houston Pkwy S Ste Houston TX BLP eott release credit increase vdoc
